newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HK government to present company law review.
newsitem.headline: HK government to present company law review.

text.p: The Hong Kong government is set to present the findings of a two-year review on Hong Kong's company law on Thursday and launch a public consultation to the end of the year, a Financial Services Branch spokesman said.
The consultancy review of the Hong Kong Companies Ordinance began in early 1995 and was completed in March this year.
Recommendations put forward by the consultants will be presented by Deputy Secretary for Financial Services Rebecca Lai at 4.15 p.m. (0815 GMT), the spokesman said.
